document.full_text: cisco systems inc chief john chambers, in a remarkably candid memo to employees, admitted the one-time technology bellwether and wall street darling has lost its way and will need to change to restore its credibility.
document.title: cisco chief vows to restore "flawed" company
lines_and_colors: cisco systems inc chief john chambers, in a remarkably candid memo to employees, admitted the one-time technology bellwether and wall street darling has lost its way and will need to change to restore its credibility.
